Text:
When I try to start the game, I get this:

ERROR in
action number 1
of Draw Event
for object o_initialize:

Error opening binary file.
me gots the same problem... helpz up redfoxy!!
I get a virus warning when I want to run the .exe file :/

it works perfectly as do all your games, thank you!!! also for those of you who are having trouble and getting an error message this is what you do....click on it with the right button on your mouse go down to RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR and BAM! there you go and enjoy!!
there is no viruses on any of the games from Foxy, i have downloaded at least 8.
